name: Bodybag
description:
Get rid of the body!

In this physics crime resolution physics simulation, either play with a friend or be an ambidextrous hero yourself, and just GET RID OF THE BODY!

Made during Global Game Jam 2015 in 48 hours.

----------------------------

Like it? Hate it? Tell me about it!
Find me @tuism, @twoplusgames or at twoplusgames.com
